entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
